ability.name: Magic Wand
ability.description: * You may also play a Wand on Cups and Balls. * While a Wand is on Cups and Balls: * All cards now count as Wands, as well as their original suit. * This includes Major Arcana: A Justice, for example, counts as a "11 of Wands".
ability.flavor: "It's not the wand that's magic - the wand is nothing more than a prop to guide the eyes away from what's really happening. It's the magician who's magic."
